name: asegstats2table
description: Converts a subcortical stats file created by recon-all and/or mri_segstats (e.g., aseg.stats) into a table.

inputs.name: Subjects
inputs.description: List of subjects.

inputs.name: Inputs
inputs.description: List of input stat files.

inputs.name: Output Table File
inputs.description: The output table file.

inputs.name: Subjects File
inputs.description: Name of the file which has the list of subjects (one subject per line).

inputs.name: QDEC Table
inputs.description: Name of the qdec table which has the column of subjects ids (fsid).

inputs.name: Longitudinal QDEC Table
inputs.description: Name of the longitudinal qdec table with column of tp ids (fsid) and subject templates (fsid-base).

inputs.name: FSGD File
inputs.description: Name of the FSGD file to extract subjects from.

inputs.name: Max Segmentation Number
inputs.description: Specify the maximum segmentation number.

inputs.name: Segmentation IDs from File
inputs.description: Output only the segmentations present in the specified file.

inputs.name: Include Segmentation IDs
inputs.description: Include only the specified segmentation IDs.

inputs.name: Exclude Segmentation IDs
inputs.description: Exclude the specified segmentation IDs.

inputs.name: Measure
inputs.description: Measure to report: default is volume (alternative: mean, std).

inputs.name: Delimiter
inputs.description: Delimiter between measures in the table. Default is tab (alternative: comma, space, semicolon).

inputs.name: Stats File
inputs.description: Use specified stats file instead of 'aseg.stats'.

inputs.name: Subdirectory
inputs.description: Use specified subdir instead of 'stats/'.

inputs.name: Scale Factor
inputs.description: Scale factor for all values written to output file. Default is 1.

inputs.name: Write eTIV
inputs.description: Report volume as percent estimated total intracranial volume.

inputs.name: Debug Mode
inputs.description: Increase verbosity for debugging purposes.

inputs.name: Transpose Table
inputs.description: Transpose the table: subjects in columns and segmentations in rows.

inputs.name: Common Segmentations Flag
inputs.description: Output only the segmentations common to all stats files.

inputs.name: All Segmentations Flag
inputs.description: Output all segmentations in the stats files given.

inputs.name: No Volume Extras Flag
inputs.description: Do not include global volume measures like BrainSegVol.

inputs.name: Skip Missing Flag
inputs.description: Skip subjects that do not have a stats file.

inputs.name: Replace 5.3 Names Flag
inputs.description: Replace 5.3 structure names with later names.

output-files.name: Output Table
output-files.description: The resulting table file with segmentation data.

author: FreeSurfer Developers
